name: early-bird

effect.x-y: This Pokémon's remaining sleep turn count falls by 2 rather than 1. If this Pokémon's sleep counter is at 1, it will fall to 0 and then the Pokémon will wake up.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: This Pokémon's remaining sleep turn count falls by 2 rather than 1. If this Pokémon's sleep counter is at 1, it will fall to 0 and then the Pokémon will wake up.

short_effect: Makes sleep pass twice as quickly.

flavor_text.x-y: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.
